replicaCount.title: Replicas
replicaCount.description: Number of copies of the application to run simultaneously

ccsFs.title: OLCF Filesystem Annotation
ccsFs.description: OLCF filesystem annotation value to use when the batch scheduler is enabled. For marble, use olcf. For onyx, use ccsopen.

ingress.title: Ingress
ingress.description: Manage external out-of-cluster access to service

external.title: External Route
external.description: Check if you want to enable routing traffic from Internet (requires project-specific settings enabled by OLCF)

cluster.Title: Slate Cluster
cluster.description: This must be set to the cluster being deployed to unless setting the Host URL

hostOverride.title: Host URL
hostOverride.description: Set a custom host URL, this defaults to <releasename>-<namespace>.apps.<cluster>.ccs.ornl.gov

requests.description: The minimum amount of resources required for the workload

limits.description: The aboslute limit for the resource request, if the workload exceeds this it could get evicted
